name: Sport Car Driving Experience 2
description:
Sport Car Driving Experience 2 is action and adventure racing game with incredible competition. You are in hilly area, with all the twists and turns, going up the hill or down the hill, keeping your sports car and turbo intact as a Dr. does for his patients.
Features:
- Stunning 3D hilly environment.
- Amazing sound effects and animations makes driving even more interesting.
- Real car physics and extremely smooth control as traffic rider.
- Carefully designed challenging levels.
- Enhance AI racing cars, they will increase their speed, if you passing by, so watch out.
- Buttons, steering and tilt controls available.
